text: Motion
Motion
School Announcement
Ah, Producer! Good work!

Good work.
Oh... Where did the staff go?

They all went somewhere for meetings
or preparations. It's just me now.

Haha, it feels like I'm left behind during
lunch break, unable to eat the school lunch.

I'm not the type to leave lunch uneaten, you know?
I'll enjoy every bit of it!

I can totally imagine that...
So, how's today's bento?

Hehehe, my recommendation is...
this imitation crab! It's sweet and juicy.

Did you get a bento box too?
Then, I'll grab the same one...

Are you going to eat now too, Producer?
Come, have a seat!

Um, I'm sorry about earlier...
I stopped the camera for a while...

Maybe it's because today's work was at school,
or maybe I felt too timid to join in...

When I couldn't get close to Mano and Hiori,
I suddenly felt nervous...
Ehehe...

But instead of complaining,
I should focus on what I can do right now, right?

There should be something I can do to help no
matter the situation. I have to create my own place!

So, I won't refuse or choose anymore.
I seemed to have forgotten that a little.

"The school festival will end in 10 minutes."
"Please head to the school gate, everyone."
...Good luck, everyone...
